about_the_game:
User Manual Description

The Jett Rider User Manual is your comprehensive guide to mastering the biggest 2D adventure of the year! This 42-page manual dives deep into the captivating world of Jett Rider, a space sweeper who unexpectedly becomes the hero in a mission to save the planet Gravos. Whether you're a new player or a seasoned adventurer, this manual will help you navigate through every aspect of the game.

Inside, you’ll find detailed sections on game controls, gameplay mechanics, and the various tools and items at your disposal. Learn more about the different characters, including both allies and enemies, and consult the complete bestiary to prepare for the toughest bosses. Explore the world of Gravos with a fully illustrated world map, and take advantage of tips and tricks to enhance your gameplay experience.

With this manual in hand, you'll be fully equipped to reduce, reuse, and blast off into the heart of the Jett Rider adventure!

Main Sections:

  • Complete Game Overview: Learn the controls, settings, and mechanics to kickstart your adventure.

  • Characters & Enemies: Meet key characters and study your foes with the detailed bestiary.

  • World Exploration: Navigate the planet Gravos with a full world map at your fingertips.

  • Pro Tips & Tricks: Master the game with essential advice to conquer every challenge.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Jett Rider - Game User Manual

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / GT, ATI Raedon HD 2600 XT
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 4GB / Radeon RX 5700-XT 4GB or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The Jett Rider manual covers everything you need: game controls, characters, enemies, a bestiary, a world map, and tips to enhance your gameplay. It’s the perfect companion for navigating the action-packed adventure on planet Gravos.
